name: Olympic Financial
overview:
Olympic Financial (olyfinancial.com) is a leading powerhouse in the Equipment Financing and Leasing industry located in the beautiful Pacific NW. Olympic offers commercial equipment financing options and guidance to a wide array of business owners throughout the United States and Canada.

With over 14 years studying and developing a strong understanding of equipment financing lending institutions credit underwriting guidelines and processes, Olympic proudly provides their customers and partners with the best financing approvals and options available.

Education and understanding about equipment financing options plays a critical role in each business ownerâ€™s decision of whether or not they should finance or pay cash for new equipment acquisitions. Through consultation, Olympicsâ€™ team works closely with their customers to ensure they have a thorough understanding of options and advantages that equipment financing can provide. Olympic diligently provides their customers an understanding of how their individual company will be perceived by lending institutions. This education in the â€œwhys and howâ€™sâ€ of lending institutions help their customers have a better expectation of the type of approval they can expect to see once a request has been submitted on their behalf.

Olympic Financials founder has been enthusiastically offering equipment financing, training and guidance in the leasing for over 14 years. Through years of relationship building, Olympic has established partnerships with the top equipment financing lending institutions in the industry. With their established partnerships, Olympic proudly offers their customers equipment financing options ranging from $5,000 to $1,000,000. creative lending services provided include; AR Factoring, Merchant Cash Advances, Manufacturer private lable finance programs and Financial Consultation.

Follow Olympic Financial on Twitter (bizequipfinance) or view their website at (olyfinancial.com) to learn more.
